item.title: Epic Games Publishing to publish sci-fi action adventure game from Section 9 Interactive
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/epic-games-publishing-to-publish-sci-fi-action-adventure-game-from-section-9-interactive

  • PC

Sweden-based studio made up of former Little Nightmares developers.

Epic Games Publishing has announced it will publish the debut title from Section 9 Interactive, a Malmo, Sweden-based developer whose staff has previously worked in leading roles on games such as Little Nightmares, Little Nightmares II, and LittleBigPlanet for PS Vita. It is a science-fiction action adventure game planned for release on current generation consoles and PC.

“We’ll be working with the talented team over at Section 9 Interactive to publish their next unannounced title, built in Unreal Engine,” Epic Games said in the announcement. “They’re DEEP in development… stay tuned for updates.”

While Section 9 Interactive has yet to formally announce its debut title, several GIFs on the developer’s official website share an early (pre-alpha) in-game look. Here are all eight GIFs merged into one (soundless) video:
